WorkItem.Description:
Hi,

I'm a beginner, so maybe this is an easy issue to sort but I'm lost and I need some help, please.

I've downloaded GMap with these files (Demo.WindowsForms.exe, GMap.NET.Core.dll, GMap.NET.Core.xml, GMap.NET.WindowsForms.dll, GMap.NET.WindowsForms.xml, License.txt, VB.net).

I'm working on Windows 7 and when I run Demo.WindowsForms.exe, I get the error attached and I can't get any map. I've tried to change the zoom, disable Firewall and something else, but I couldn't run it.

I didn't find any information about this issue. If someone could help me, I'd be grateful.

Many Thanks

Comments.Message: it's some kind of proxy issue, if you check the demo code, you can disable it or set

Thanks a lot. I'm really lost about it.

Could you tell me what file I have to check, please?

Again, many thanks for your help.
